name: postcss-logical-polyfill

0.2.0.name: postcss-logical-polyfill

scripts.prepublish: pnpm run lint && pnpm run test:ci && pnpm run build

0.2.0.description: A PostCSS plugin that provides physical property polyfills for CSS logical properties with intelligent direction-aware selector handling

0.3.0.name: postcss-logical-polyfill

scripts.prepublish: pnpm run lint && pnpm run test:ci && pnpm run build

0.3.0.description: A PostCSS plugin that provides physical property polyfills for CSS logical properties with intelligent direction-aware selector handling and block-direction optimization

0.4.0.name: postcss-logical-polyfill

scripts.prepublish: pnpm run lint && pnpm run test:ci && pnpm run build

0.4.0.description: A PostCSS plugin that provides physical property polyfills for CSS logical properties with intelligent direction-aware selector handling, block-direction optimization, and extended logical property support via shim system
